thread.title: 3 ways to be lip-pretty this festive season
thread.title_full: 3 ways to be lip-pretty this festive season - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: 3 ways to be lip-pretty this festive season
text:
Besides the traditional attire and adornments, here's how you can make sure you have beautiful lips that will have you smiling through the festive season...
1) Before you begin, ensure your lips are clean and recently exfoliated so that the colour won't appear flaky. Also ensure your lips are moisturized.Now apply colour to the middle of the bottom lip, going towards the corners. Then press your lips together to transfer colour to the upper lip. Blot using some tissue. Repeat to ensure the colour lasts longer.
2) If you want your lips to stand out, choose colours suitable to your complexion. Have a set of them so that you can keep alternating between the various tones to look trendy and fresh every day of the festive season.
3) Choose textures that are friendly for your skin. From wet to glossy , lip shades are available in many textures that you can choose as per the look you're planning on going for as well.Glossy textures make you look youthful, but could be a tad bit too much, while matte textures are ideal for the classy look.
